Starting from €1,150,000, these villas represent 40% better value than comparable Spanish island markets, making MIRADOR SANTA ROSALIA VILLAS an intelligent choice for investors and lifestyle seekers alike.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and must comply with local registration requirements. Our team can guide you through all legal and administrative processes to ensure a smooth purchase.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property price, typical costs include transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (1-2%), registry fees (0.5%), and legal fees (1-2%). For properties under €600,000, a reduced transfer tax rate may apply. We provide detailed cost breakdowns with all purchase inquiries.
